languages.text: "Благодарю, Ваша Светлость. Некоторые вещи не забываются".

traits.locale_text: "Благодарю, Ваша Светлость. Но я сделала это не ради титулов и карьеры, а ради... сестры".

languages.text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Some things are never forgotten."
languages.original_text: "Благодарю, Ваша Светлость. Некоторые вещи не забываются".

traits.locale_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. There are things you never forget."
"Thank you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. There are things you never forget."
"Thank you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Some things are never forgotten."
"Thank you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Some things are never forgotten."
"Thank you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Some things are never forgotten."
"Thank you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Some things are never forgotten."

languages.text: « Merci, Votre Seigneurie. Il est des choses qu'on n'oublie jamais. »
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Some things are never forgotten."

traits.locale_text: « Merci, Votre Seigneurie. Il est des choses qu'on n'oublie jamais. »

languages.text: «Gracias, mil{mf|ord|ady}. Hay cosas que no se pueden olvidar».
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Some things are never forgotten."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias, mil{mf|ord|ady}. Hay cosas que no se pueden olvidar».

languages.text: 「ありがとうございます、陛下。決して忘れられないことはあるものです」
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Some things are never forgotten."

traits.locale_text: 「ありがとうございます、陛下。決して忘れられないことはあるものです」

languages.text: “谢谢您，大人，有些事情是一辈子都不会忘的。”
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Some things are never forgotten."

traits.locale_text: “谢谢您，大人，有些事情是一辈子都不会忘的。”

languages.text: "Danke, Eure {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Manche Dinge vergisst man nie."
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Some things are never forgotten."

traits.locale_text: "Danke, Eure {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Manche Dinge vergisst man nie."

languages.text: "Teşekkür ederim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. İnsan bazı şeyleri unutmuyor."
languages.original_text: "Thank you, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Some things are never forgotten."
